name: MEALOGY
description:
MEALOGY is a relaxing puzzle game that has gameplay like a strategy / city-building game, but in a food version. Yes! This game is full of food!

In this game the player can choose and place the food that the player wants, the player can choose the food based on the food category, but not only do they place it randomly, the player also has to match the appropriate food combination so that the player can reach the target value.
But what if the player wanted to put food at random? Of course you can! The player can ignore the point, the player can place their food according to the imagination of the player.

MEALOGY is our project for the IGSI-GameJam-Batch-2, which given the theme "FOOD"

Developed in just 4 Days!
